name: HR 24TH WORM
description:
Technically part of Dream as Monster.
Nonsense walking sim made in less than 12 hours for the 24 hour 9.69 (YOU)jam.

All the graphics and music are thrown together from my older projects.

There's some story here, but it'll only make sense if you've played my other games. The entire process was very stream of consciousness, though.

Press SHIFT if you're stuck somewhere on the map to go back to the starting area.

Don't play this if you're under 18, there's a curse word and I just don't want you to.
